Module es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction
Package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction

Class NERMappingsFileWriter

java.lang.Object
es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction.NERMappingsFileWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
final class NERMappingsFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
Writes NER mappings to a file, in the format specified by TokensRegexNERAnnotator.

This class is designed to be used by several threads in parallel, and it is responsible for serializing writes to the resulting file. Therefore, write calls may block.

Author:
Alejandro González García

  • Constructor Details

    • NERMappingsFileWriter

      NERMappingsFileWriter​(@NonNull @NonNull java.nio.file.Path mappingsFile) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a new NER mappings file writer.
      Parameters:
      mappingsFile - The file path that will contain the mappings.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during initialization.
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If mappingsFile is null.

  • Method Details

    • writeMapping

      public void writeMapping​(@NonNull @NonNull java.lang.String token, @NonNull @NonNull java.lang.String type, @NonNull @NonNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> overwritableTypes) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes the specified named entity mapping to the named entity mappings file associated to this writer, with a priority of 0.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to add a mapping to. It will be interpreted as a Java regular expression. Empty tokens will be ignored and not written to the file.
      type - The label of the named entity type the named entity identified by the token belongs to.
      overwritableTypes - A list of named entity types that this mapping is able to override. This list can be empty.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any parameter is null, or overwritableTypes contains a null element.
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the operation, or the writer is closed.

    • writeMapping

      public void writeMapping​(@NonNull @NonNull java.lang.String token, @NonNull @NonNull java.lang.String type, @NonNull @NonNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> overwritableTypes, int priority) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes the specified named entity mapping to the named entity mappings file associated to this writer.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to add a mapping to. It will be interpreted as a Java regular expression. Empty tokens will be ignored and not written to the file.
      type - The label of the named entity type the named entity identified by the token belongs to.
      overwritableTypes - A list of named entity types that this mapping is able to override. This list can be empty.
      priority - The priority of this mapping. Higher values take precendence.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any parameter is null, or overwritableTypes contains a null element.
      java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the operation, or the writer is closed.
